WILL LINEBREAK IF ONLY '.' IS SPECIFIED

The character, repeated Amount times. IE:
Repeater('-',4) --> "----"

member.name: T:Igtampe.BasicRender.SpecialChars
member.summary:
Class that holds special characters for extended rendering.
N D D-S S-D
┌─┬┐ ╔═╦╗ ╓─╥╖ ╒═╤╕
├─┼┤ ╠═╬╣ ╟─╫╢ ╞═╪╡
└─┴┘ ╚═╩╝ ╙─╨╜ ╘═╧╛
N : single box characters
D : double box characters
DS: Double vertical, Single Horizontal Box Characters
SD: Single Vertical, Double Horizontal Box Characters

member.summary: Left half of a block

member.summary: ½

member.summary: ²
